title: Experienced Video Editor for  YouTube
description:
Looking for an Experienced Video Editor for Faceless YouTube Channel 



We’re looking for a reliable editor who can produce quality videos for our faceless YouTube channel



Right now, we handle the editing ourselves using Canva (video + B-roll + images) along with CapCut for transitions and additional elements. We’re ready to bring someone on who can take over this role and grow with us.



Our average video length is about 18 minutes, and we’re looking for a minimum of 3 videos per week, with 4 per week being ideal once you’re comfortable with our pacing and style.



Pay: Flat fee of $16 USD per video

Start: Immediately



Most of our content is list-style videos. The editing itself isn’t technically complex, but it does require time and strong attention to detail because visuals need to closely match what’s being discussed.



Attention to detail is extremely important to us.

We have a mature, detail-oriented audience, so we are not looking for fast or sloppy work. The videos need to feel intentional, well-paced, and visually aligned with the narration.



Typical responsibilities include:



Mixing images and video clips throughout



Adding rolling titles and on-screen text



Matching visuals carefully to narration points



Background music layering (we provide the soundtracks)



Occasionally adding short clips (for example from TikTok, depending on the topic)



All background music tracks



Example videos for reference (links attached)



You’ll mainly be responsible for sourcing visuals (public domain, stock, web images, etc.), selecting appropriate music from our provided tracks, and assembling the videos according to our style.



===== We can pay weekly via Wise. =====



Also, strong English comprehension is very important for this role. You need to clearly understand the concepts we’re discussing so you can accurately source videos, images, and content that match what’s being said. Attention to detail really matters to us.

title: AI Content Creator (Graphic Designer / Video Editor) Creative
description:
Join Formulated as Our AI Creative Designer – Turn Science-Backed Supplements into Ads People Can't Scroll Past

Remote | Full-Time | $10–$30 USD/hr Based on Experience



Who We Are

Formulated (transitioning from Formulation Factory) is a growing, science-first direct-to-consumer supplement brand already doing $10M+ in annual revenue on Amazon—with real transparency, clinical doses, third-party testing, and no shortcuts.

Our founder Kyle's journey started with a life-changing a
 at 17: brain injury, years of recovery, and discovering low testosterone when no one had real answers. That led to 15+ years of personal experimentation, kitchen blends for friends, and eventually building a brand people trust because the products actually work.



Now we're expanding into DTC—Meta, TikTok, and beyond—to reach more lifters, founders, and high-performers who want real results. We need strong creatives to help make that happen.



Your Role: AI Creative Designer – D2C Ads & Short-Form Video



You'll create high-impact ads (statics, motion graphics, vertical videos) that grab attention and drive sales on Meta, TikTok, Amazon, and more. Using AI tools to generate and iterate fast (10–20+ variations when needed), then polishing with your design eye to keep everything on-brand and effective.



What You'll Do Day-to-Day



Build scroll-stopping creatives optimized for paid channels: hooks in 1–2 seconds, clear messaging, strong CTAs.

Use AI (Runway, Midjourney, Sora, Firefly, etc.) to scale ideas quickly—then curate and refine so outputs feel premium and realistic.

Edit short-form videos in CapCut/After Effects/Premiere with great pacing, text overlays, and D2C structure.

Collaborate on ideas, iterate based on feedback + performance data (CTR, conversions), and help scale what works.

Contribute to building our DTC look & feel—premium, aspirational, emotional appeal that fits supplements for serious people.



Why Join Us?



Real Impact — Your ads will directly help grow a brand people believe in. See results fast in a lean team with quick decisions.

Creative Freedom with Tools — AI multiplies your output; you bring the taste, strategy, and polish.

Flexible Remote Life — Work from anywhere in LatAm, flexible hours (with some U.S. overlap), plus an annual team retreat.

Growth Opportunity — As we scale (new products, genetic testing, omni-channel), strong performers grow with us.

Mission That Matters — We're fixing an industry full of hype with real science and transparency.



What We're Looking For



Experience with paid D2C ads (static + video) and some proven results.

Solid skills in graphic design, video editing, and tools like Photoshop, Illustrator, CapCut.

Comfort using AI in your workflow (show us examples!).

Knowledge of ad platform specs (Meta, TikTok, Amazon).

Ability to work independently and move quickly.

Strong English (written + spoken).



Portfolio should show paid ad work, variations/iterations, and how you use AI.

Not a Fit If You're only into slow brand work, pure AI generation without editing skills, or need heavy structure/long timelines.

Compensation & Details



$10–$30 USD/hour (competitive for the region, based on your experience and output).

Full-time, fully remote.

Long-term role with room to grow as we expand.



Ready to Apply?

 



Resume/CV

Portfolio link

Quick note (2–4 sentences): How do you use AI in your creative process right now? Share a real example.



We’re excited to see your work and chat about how you can help us build something people love.

Legends are Formulated.

– Kyle & The Formulated Team

title: Customer service

title: Construction Project Management VA  (House Flipping) -PST Morning Shifts

This is a long-term role with growth opportunity for the right person.

Budget & Expense Tracking

• Maintain project budgets and cost reports

• Monitor invoices, payments, and receipts

• Assist with basic bookkeeping and financial tracking

Operational Support

• Create workflows, checklists, and process documentation

• Build and maintain project trackers (Google Sheets, Excel, etc.)

• Help improve systems and efficiency

• Provide daily progress updates



Requirements (IMPORTANT – Please read carefully):

Experience

• Minimum 3 years experience as a Real Estate Virtual Assistant or Project Coordinator

• Real estate, construction, or renovation experience is HIGHLY preferred

• Experience supporting US-based clients preferred



Skills

• Excellent English communication (written and spoken)

• Comfortable calling contractors and vendors

• Strong organizational and time management skills

• Detail-oriented and proactive

• Strong with numbers and spreadsheets



Technical Skills

Must be proficient with:

• Google Sheets / Excel

• Google Drive

• Project tracking 

• Bookkeeping and Budgeting



Availability

• Must be available during PST morning hours

• Reliable internet connection

• Quiet work environment



Personality Traits I Am Looking For:

• Responsible and reliable

• Honest and trustworthy

• Proactive problem solver

• Able to think independently

• Not afraid to follow up with people



Bonus (Not Required, But Strong Advantage):

• Experience working with real estate investors

• Experience managing renovation projects

• Bookkeeping experience (QuickBooks is a plus)



Compensation:

• Starting rate: $5–$10/hour depending on experience

• Long-term opportunity and commitments only



How to Apply:

Please include:

Your resume

Description of your real estate project management experience

Example of a project tracker or spreadsheet you have created

Your availability (PST hours)

Subject Line: Project Management VA Application – [Your Name]

title: Clothing Brand Operations Manager
description:
Company Overview:

We are a growing clothing brand seeking a highly experienced and detail-oriented Operations Manager to oversee the daily operations of our business. This role requires a strategic thinker who can coordinate between different teams, ensure smooth workflows, and keep everything running efficiently.



Responsibilities:

 • Team Coordination: Ensure the design team is on track with production schedules and delivering high-quality work.

 • Supplier & Production Management: Communicate with suppliers to monitor production timelines, quality control, and order fulfillment.

 • Financial Oversight: Work with the office team to ensure timely payments for suppliers, manufacturers, and other business expenses.

 • Logistics & Shipping: Coordinate with the shipping company to ensure smooth and timely deliveries.

 • Process Optimization: Identify and implement ways to improve efficiency in operations.

 • Issue Resolution: Quickly address any problems in production, logistics, or payments to prevent delays.

 • General Business Operations: Oversee daily activities to ensure the business runs smoothly, including admin tasks and reporting to management.



Requirements:

 • Proven experience in operations management within a clothing brand or a related industry.

 • Strong leadership and communication skills.

 • Experience working with suppliers, shipping companies, and financial departments.

 • Ability to manage multiple tasks and teams effectively.

 • Detail-oriented with strong problem-solving skills.

 • Knowledge of e-commerce and logistics is a plus.



How to Apply:

If you have the experience and skills to manage and grow a clothing brand efficiently, we’d love to hear from you! Please send your resume with a headshot photo, relevant work experience, and a short introduction about why you’re a great fit for this role.



We're looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Language Experts ( Tagalog Language Expert)
description:
Job Title: Tagalog Language Expert

Job Type: Contract

Location: Remote



Job Summary



We are hiring on behalf of our client for a Tagalog Language Expert to support translation, localization, and linguistic quality projects. In this remote contract role, you will use your expertise in Tagalog language and culture to ensure clear, accurate, and culturally appropriate communication across various deliverables.



Key Responsibilities



• Translate, localize, and review Tagalog content for accuracy and cultural relevance.

• Ensure tone, context, and messaging remain consistent across materials.

• Collaborate with project managers and team members to meet deadlines.

• Edit and proofread written materials for grammar, clarity, and correctness.

• Provide expert guidance on idiomatic expressions and regional nuances.

• Develop and maintain glossaries and language resources.

• Conduct linguistic quality assurance and participate in feedback cycles.

• Support written and verbal communication with professionalism.



Required Skills & Qualifications



• Native or near-native Tagalog proficiency with excellent English communication skills.

• Proven experience in translation, localization, or linguistic QA.

• Strong written and verbal communication abilities.

• Ability to work independently in a remote environment.

• Deep understanding of Tagalog grammar, orthography, and stylistic conventions.

• Detail-oriented, organized, and quality-driven mindset.



Preferred Qualifications



• Bachelor’s degree in Linguistics, Translation, Communications, or related field.

• Experience supporting international remote teams.

• Background in content development or language technology projects.





Application Process:



To formally proceed with your application, qualified candidates are required to submit their credentials via
.



Please send your application to:







Subject Line Format:

Tagalog Language Expert Application – [Full Name]



Kindly attach and include the following:



Updated CV in PDF format



A concise summary of your professional experience in Tagalog translation/localization



Your expected hourly rate



Your weekly availability



One short translation sample (3–5 sentences) demonstrating formal Tagalog writing



Applications that do not follow the required format will not be processed. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further evaluation.



We appreciate your interest and look forward to reviewing qualified applications.

If you love content, understand why videos go viral (or flop), and enjoy building systems that make creative teams run smoothly — this role is for you.

Content Operations Manager



Performance Analyst

You will work directly with the founder and help bring structure, clarity, and performance optimization to our content machine.

Organize and maintain editor folders and content databases



Keep assets clean, labeled, and updated



Ensure content workflows stay organized and efficient



Do periodic audits to keep everything streamlined



Identify gaps or bottlenecks in our content systems

Track every video posted



Collect and log analytics weekly



Monitor performance trends across platforms



Identify why videos performed well or underperformed

Present actionable recommendations (what to fix, what to double down on)



You must understand:



Hooks



Retention



CTR



Thumbnails



Titles



Audience psychology



Storytelling structure



We don’t just want reports — we want insights.



3?? Creative & Visual Planning



Create visual roadmap boards (Miro boards)



Help structure content strategies visually



Build organized idea boards



Help map out content themes and creative direction



Understand what “good content” looks like



You should be visually creative and structured.



4?? Hiring & Talent Research



Source and vet talent (editors, creatives, etc.)



Create a hiring process



Pre-screen candidates



Organize interviews



Help build systems for evaluating talent



We want someone who understands how to identify quality.



5?? Systems & Accountability



Track weekly improvement goals



Make sure action items are completed



Identify weak areas in content performance



Suggest improvements proactively



Hold the team accountable to performance metrics



???? Ideal Candidate



You are:



Extremely organized



Creative and visually sharp



Analytical and data-driven



Proactive (you don’t wait to be told what to fix)



Detail-oriented



A content nerd (you watch and analyze content naturally)



Comfortable using tools like:



Canva



Google Sheets



Miro



Notion (preferred)



Social media analytics dashboards



Bonus if you:



Have worked with content creators or media brands



Understand YouTube / TikTok performance deeply



Have built performance dashboards before



???? Work Structure



Remote



Part-time to start (with opportunity to grow)



Weekly reporting required



Long-term role for the right person



???? What Success Looks Like



Clean, organized content systems



Clear weekly performance reports



Strategic recommendations



Improved content metrics over time



Strong hiring pipeline



Smooth operational flow



???? To Apply



Please include:



A brief introduction about yourself



Examples of performance reports you’ve created (if any)



Experience with content analytics



Tools you are strongest with



A short breakdown of a viral video and why it worked



Your hourly rate



Your availability (hours per week)



Start your application with the word “Momentum” so we know you read everything.

title: Dispute Manager – PayPal, Airwallex & Shopify Payments
description:
I'm looking for an experienced, detail-oriented Dispute Manager to support my fast-growing eCommerce business on an as-needed basis. This is not a full-time position — you'll be called in when disputes arise and are expected to handle them independently from start to finish.

Only apply if you have a proven track record in chargeback management. I need someone precise, proactive, and available on short notice.

Role Overview

You will manage disputes as they occur across PayPal, Airwallex, and Shopify Payments for multiple eCommerce brands, including:



Chargeback responses and representment submissions

Dispute reason code analysis and evidence alignment

Customer outreach and reversal letter collection

Fight-or-accept decisions based on processor-specific rules



Requirements



3+ years of eCommerce dispute or chargeback management experience (non-negotiable)

Deep understanding of Visa/Mastercard/Amex dispute conditions and evidence standards

Familiarity with Shopify Payments' one-submission limitation

Experience with PayPal's internal dispute logic

Strong written English; ability to draft professional evidence packages and reversal letters

Fast turnaround — dispute deadlines are strict and non-negotiable

Reliable and fully independent — no hand-holding



Paid Trial

You'll handle 1–3 real disputes as a paid trial. I'll assess accuracy, evidence quality, and decision-making. Strong performance leads to ongoing work on a per-dispute or retainer basis.

title: Meta Ads Media Buyer (B2B Lead Gen | GoHighLevel | Tracking-Focused)
description:
We are a growing B2B lead generation agency helping service-based businesses generate qualified booked appointments through AI Booking Engines.



This is NOT ecommerce.

This is NOT social media management.



We run lean-budget B2B appointment funnels ($500–$1,500/month per client), so tracking accuracy and smart optimization are critical.



We are looking for a performance-focused Meta Ads Media Buyer who understands tracking, testing, and data-driven optimization.



Strategy direction will be provided. Your role is to execute with precision, make optimization decisions confidently, and clearly explain your reasoning.



Responsibilities:



- Build and manage Meta Ads campaigns for B2B lead generation

- Set up and verify Meta Pixel + Conversion API

- Create and manage Custom Conversions focused on booked calls (not just leads)

- Monitor and optimize campaigns based on CPL and cost per booked appointment

- Conduct structured audience and creative testing

- Troubleshoot tracking and reporting issues

- Provide weekly performance reports with insights and recommendations



You should be comfortable working inside:

- Meta Ads Manager

- Events Manager

- GoHighLevel (or similar CRM)

- Basic funnel tracking systems



Bonus if you have:

- Experience with B2B lead generation campaigns

- Experience optimizing for booked appointments

- Strong understanding of audience psychology for service businesses

- Basic CRO knowledge for landing pages



This is a long-term opportunity for the right candidate.

title: UREGENT | Senior Full Stack Developer
description:
IMPORTANT: If you are interested and qualified, please submit a link to your resume AND your voice recording to 
  will only process applications of those who will send both. Applications sent through OLJ will be automatically discarded. DO NOT apply if you do not have the experience.



Senior Full Stack Developer (Distributed Systems &

Computational Modeling)



Role Overview: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer to join our core

engineering team building a proprietary platform for high-stakes industrial simulations and

capital project optimization. You will be responsible for developing the underlying

framework that manages complex, multi-stage computational pipelines. Your work will

focus on the seamless integration of heavy backend processing with a responsive, datarich

user experience, ensuring the reliable execution of sophisticated resource and design

optimizations.



Technical Requirements

1. Backend & Distributed Systems (Python Core):

• High-Performance Python: Advanced proficiency in Python, specifically utilizing

numerical and scientific libraries for large-scale data manipulation and algorithmic

optimization.

• Asynchronous Architecture: Extensive experience with distributed task queues

(e.g., Celery) to manage long-running, interdependent background processes and

complex workflow signatures.

• Algorithmic Implementation: Strong background in applied mathematics,

including spatial geometry, graph theory, and network flow optimization.

• Data Lifecycle Management: Expertise in managing state across distributed

systems using high-performance caching layers and persistent databases.



2. API & Real-Time Infrastructure:

• Framework Mastery: Deep experience with Python-based web frameworks (e.g.,

Django) for building robust, secure, and scalable API architectures.

• Real-Time Data Streaming: Proficiency in implementing WebSockets or similar

protocols to provide live telemetry and status updates from background engines to

the end-user.

• System Integrity: Experience designing systems that maintain strict data

consistency across multi-step, automated computational workflows.



3. Frontend & Visualization:

• Data-Intensive UIs: Ability to build sophisticated interfaces for managing complex

input parameters and visualizing multi-variable simulation outputs.

• Spatial Visualization: Experience rendering and manipulating 3D geometric entities

(vertices, faces, and polylines) within the browser to provide visual validation of

backend calculations.





Key Responsibilities:

• Bridge the gap between high-level logical planning and low-level computational

execution.

• Optimize the performance of proprietary spatial and geometric algorithms.

• Build the infrastructure that allows users to audit and interact with complex,

automated engineering decisions in real-time.

• Maintain and scale a distributed environment where background tasks must operate

with high reliability and low latency.





Preferred Qualifications:

• Degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Physics, or a related

Engineering field.

• Proven track record of building "Human-in-the-loop" systems where users interact

with complex automated processes.

• Prior experience in fields such as industrial automation, logistics, CAD software

development, or advanced manufacturing simulations.

• Familiarity with mining/energy industries is a plus.



IMPORTANT: If you are interested and qualified, please submit a link to your resume AND your voice recording to 
  will only process applications of those who will send both. Applications sent through OLJ will be automatically discarded. DO NOT apply if you do not have the experience.

title: Experienced Social Media Manager and Video Editor
description:
JoshxTrades and Bison Blueprint is looking for a Part Time Social Media Manager to handle it's social media presence. JoshxTrades is a online stock trading community hosted in Discord that seeks to share our top stock and options picks with community members for a monthly fee. We are also building a stock trading course for a premium fee. We currently use all social media platforms including Instagram, Tiktok,
,
/X, Youtube. This is all managed via Hootsuite. You can find us on most social media platforms 



The responsibilities of the job include:

- Video editing for short form and long form videos using either Riverside or other technologies

- Planning and scheduling social media posts on all platforms using Hootsuite 

- Creating success cards celebrating our wins on alerted stocks to create a sense of FOMO for potential users 

- Managing our store and product listing on WHOP to increase conversions 

- Creating trading meme and viral videos to entertain our audience

- Schedule podcasts via Podmatch with podcast hosts - use those videos for additional content 

- Create Call to Action stories that are posted on a regular schedule 

- Special marketing projects as assigned 



The outcomes of your actions that will be measured:

- Growing social media posts exposure via views and time viewed leading to virality 

- Growing social media followers 

- Converting followers into paid customers 



The #1 thing we avoid with our brand is that we NEVER use AI for anything, because the brand is focused around a personal connection with me as an influencer. Some tools that use AI to shorten editing times are OK but serious candidates will be required to show that they can perform the job without the help of AI to avoid our content become AI slop. 



Please don't send in an AI generated spam resume,
, and cover letter - I can spot them from a mile away and won't read them.. Please just focus on providing me three things:

1. A list of social media accounts you have worked for in the past so I can review your work 

2. A link or a Google Drive link to a copy of short and long form videos that you have personally edited for another brand

3. A description of your experience working with influencers and service brands (as opposed to product brand) in the US only

title: Creative Landing/Checkout Page Design for Stan Store
description:
Must have experience in building Stan Store checkout pages for B2C courses - please provide portfolio and landing pages you have designed. If you have no experience in this and do not meet the qualifications below do not apply 



Role Overview

We are hiring a high-level Conversion Designer who specializes in Stan Store landing pages, checkout flows, and lead magnet creation. This is not a basic Canva role. We are looking for a designer who understands copywriting psychology, premium visual design, and digital funnel strategy — someone who can build assets that convert, not just look good.



You will be expected to translate provided inspiration and brand direction into polished, high-impact deliverables that reflect modern creator-economy standards and direct-response marketing principles.



?



What This Role Is Not

• Not a beginner Canva editor

• Not template-level output

• Not “make it pretty” design work



We are looking for strategic designers who understand persuasion, hierarchy, and buyer behavior.



?



Core Responsibilities

• Design high-converting Stan Store landing and checkout pages

• Create premium lead magnets (PDF guides, workbooks, checklists, templates, mini-ebooks)

• Produce Canva video assets (promo reels, animated graphics, product teasers)

• Apply direct-response layout principles — headline hierarchy, CTA placement, trust elements, urgency sections

• Integrate copy structure and persuasive flow into visual design

• Match and elevate provided examples, references, and brand direction

• Ensure mobile-first optimization and platform readiness

• Maintain consistent visual identity across all funnel assets



?



Required Expertise

• Demonstrated experience building Stan Store pages that convert

• Advanced Canva mastery — static, animation, video, typography, and layout systems

• Strong understanding of copywriting structure and persuasion psychology

• Ability to design with intent and strategy, not decoration

• Portfolio showing landing pages, lead magnets, and conversion-focused creatives

• Knowledge of visual hierarchy, whitespace, and modern UI aesthetics



?



Preferred Background

• Digital marketing / creator economy / info-product niches

• Experience designing for Instagram funnels and short-form ecosystems

• Understanding of branding systems and typography pairing

• Familiarity with direct-response marketing frameworks



?



Deliverables May Include

• Stan Store product and checkout pages

• Lead magnet PDFs and workbooks

• Canva animated promo videos and reels

• Funnel graphics and CTA sections

• Banners, thumbnails, and brand visuals



?



What We Provide

• Clear inspiration and reference material

• Brand direction and offer details

• Iterative feedback loops for refinement



?



Ideal Candidate Traits

• Conversion-minded, not just design-minded

• Visually precise and detail-oriented

• Understands buyer psychology and persuasion flow

• Able to execute premium, modern aesthetics

• Fast, iterative, and receptive to feedback

• Comfortable elevating provided inspiration into original, high-level output



Primary Objective:

Create clean, modern, psychologically-informed digital assets that turn visitors into leads and buyers — not just viewers.

title: Twilio Setup
description:
Twilio Studio & API Integration Specialist (Immediate Start – $9/hour)



Overview



We are seeking a Twilio Studio and API Integration Specialist to configure, deploy, and integrate Twilio services into our custom software platform. This role requires hands-on experience with Twilio Studio, Twilio APIs, and the ability to collaborate directly with our software developer to establish secure, scalable communication workflows.



This is a technical implementation role involving automation, voice, SMS, and API connectivity. The ideal candidate must be able to begin immediately.



?



Compensation

 • Pay: $9.00 USD per hour

 • Schedule: Part-time to full-time depending on performance and project needs

 • Start Date: Immediate



?



Core Responsibilities



Twilio Studio Configuration

 • Design and deploy Twilio Studio flows for inbound and outbound calls

 • Configure SMS messaging workflows, auto-responses, and routing logic

 • Build IVR systems with call routing, voi
 handling, and conditional logic

 • Implement automated call handling and escalation procedures



API Integration

 • Connect Twilio services to custom software using Twilio REST APIs

 • Work directly with our software developer to ensure proper integration and authentication

 • Configure webhooks and ensure reliable communication between systems

 • Assist with integration of voice, SMS, and notification systems



System Configuration and Testing

 • Configure Twilio phone numbers, messaging services, and routing rules

 • Perform functional testing of call flows, messaging, and API integrations

 • Troubleshoot connectivity, webhook, and API issues

 • Ensure reliable and efficient system operation



?



Required Qualifications



Candidates must have demonstrable experience with:

 • Twilio Studio flow creation and deployment

 • Twilio REST API integration

 • Webhooks and API connectivity

 • Voice and SMS implementation within Twilio

 • Working alongside software developers in an integration environment

 • Reading and understanding API documentation



?



Technical Skills Required

 • Twilio Studio

 • Twilio REST API

 • Webhooks

 • API authentication (API keys, tokens, etc.)

 • JSON and HTTP requests

 • Basic troubleshooting and debugging



Preferred but not required:

 • Experience integrating Twilio with custom CRM or internal software

 • Experience with automation platforms

 • Experience working with AI-driven communication systems



?



Communication Requirements



This role requires strong communication skills. You must be able to:

 • Clearly communicate technical issues and solutions

 • Follow instructions precisely

 • Provide regular updates on progress

 • Collaborate effectively with a software developer



Fluent English communication is required.



?



Work Environment

 • Remote position

 • Must have reliable internet

 • Must be available for real-time coordination during setup



?



Immediate Need



We are ready to begin implementation immediately. Qualified candidates who can start right away will be given priority.



?



To Apply



Please include the following:

 1. Summary of your Twilio experience

 2. Description of Twilio Studio flows you have built

 3. Description of Twilio API integrations you have completed

 4. Confirmation that you can start immediately

 5. Your hourly rate confirmation of $9/hour

PLEASE

title: Advanced Video editor
description:
Advanced Video Editor for Meta Paid Ads (Paid Trial ? Retainer)



Project Type: Paid Trial (1 week)

Potential: Ongoing Retainer

Hours: Up to 3 hours total

Rate: $15–$45/hour USD

Start: ASAP



About the Project



We’re looking to hire 3 advanced video editors who specialize in Meta paid advertising to complete a short, paid trial project. Each editor will be asked to edit 1–2 Meta ad videos using provided footage and creative direction.



This trial is designed to evaluate fit for an ongoing retainer role editing Meta ads for Remento, a fast-growing brand focused on meaningful, emotional storytelling. If it’s a strong match, there is plenty of consistent, long-term editing work available.



What You’ll Do During the Trial

• Edit 1–2 short-form Meta ad videos (Reels / Feed)

• Apply performance-driven editing principles:

-Strong hooks in the first 1–3 seconds

-Clear pacing and pattern interrupts

-On-screen text optimized for sound-off viewing

• Adapt edits based on provided creative direction and ad objectives

• Deliver polished, test-ready assets within the 1-week window



Ideal Editor Profile



You’re a great fit if you:

• Specialize in Meta paid ad editing (not just general video editing)

• Actively stay up-to-date on Meta trends, formats, and algorithm shifts

• Understand consumer psychology and how editing choices affect retention and conversion

• Are comfortable editing multiple styles, including:

-UGC-style ads

-Founder-led videos

-Podcast / interview clips

-Narrative or skit-based ads

• Think in terms of performance, not just visuals

• Can work quickly, communicate clearly, and take feedback well



Post-Trial (Ongoing) Responsibilities



If selected for a retainer role, you’ll:

• Create high-performing Meta video ads to drive traffic and product sales

• Continuously adapt creative based on:

-Performance data

-New platform trends

-Shifts in user behavior

• Edit across multiple ad concepts and formats to keep creative fresh

• Collaborate closely with our marketing team to align on goals, messaging, and testing strategy



Trial Details (Important)



• Paid hourly at $15–$45/hour USD

• Maximum of 3 hours total

• 1-week cap from project start

• One-time project with clear path to ongoing work if successful



How to Apply



Please include:



1. Relevant Meta ad examples you’ve edited (links preferred)

2. A brief note on how you think about performance-driven editing

3. Your hourly rate

4. Confirmation that you’re available for a 1-week paid trial

description:
### About the Role



We are a Swiss-based Amazon wholesale reseller operating in the **US and UK marketplaces**.



We are looking for a **Wholesale Brand & Supplier Sourcing Specialist** to help research, contact, and secure profitable wholesale accounts.



This is **not a general administrative VA role**. The focus is on sourcing high-quality brands and wholesalers that are suitable for Amazon wholesale resale.



---



### Responsibilities



* Research brands and wholesalers suitable for Amazon US & UK marketplaces

* Analyze product opportunities using Amazon data and marketplace metrics

* Conduct brand outreach via
/phone and follow-up

* Collect pricing lists and account requirements

* Assist with opening wholesale accounts

* Identify profitable ASIN opportunities based on provided criteria



---



### Software & Tools Provided



You will receive access to:



* SellerAmp SAS

* Keepa

* Company sales Gmail account

* Google Voice phone number



All outreach and communication will be handled through company-provided tools.



---



### Compensation Structure



This is a **performance-based position**.



Compensation includes:



* A small monthly base retainer

* Performance bonuses based on account quality and results

* Additional incentives linked to successful supplier onboarding and purchasing activity



Detailed KPIs, scoring criteria, and compensation structure will be shared with shortlisted candidates.



---

All suppliers, brand contacts, and sourcing information are strictly confidential.



You will be required to sign:

Suppliers sourced during this role may not be shared or used for other clients.



---

* Results-focused mindset



---



AGENCIES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THIS ROLE

title: GoHighLevel / LeadConnector Automation & Snapshot Specialist (Project-Based, Ongoing Work Available)
description:
We are a U.S.-based marketing agency looking for an experienced GoHighLevel (LeadConnector) Automation Specialist to help build CRM systems, workflows, snapshots, and AI automations for our clients.



This role begins as project-based work with ongoing opportunities for the right candidate.



You must have real experience building:



• Sales pipelines

• Speed-to-lead automations

• Estimate follow-up systems

• Review automation workflows

• Snapshot exports and structured account builds

• Tag architecture and custom field systems

• Conditional logic with stop conditions

• AI conversation workflows

• Calendar booking systems

• Webhook integrations



We are building structured, scalable systems — not random automations.



CURRENT PROJECT



We are building a Pool & Spa Growth System including:



• Lead capture funnel

• Pipeline setup

• Speed-to-lead workflow

• Estimate follow-up automation

• Review request automation

• Seasonal reactivation campaigns

• Snapshot preparation



More industries will follow (HVAC, Roofing, Home Services).



RESPONSIBILITIES



• Build structured systems inside LeadConnector

• Create reusable snapshots

• Prevent duplicate triggers and automation loops

• Ensure workflows stop properly

• Use proper naming conventions

• Document builds clearly

• Test all automation before handoff



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE



You must:



• Have at least 2 years GoHighLevel experience

• Understand difference between tags and custom fields

• Know how to prevent duplicate opportunity creation

• Know how to stop workflows on reply

• Be able to build from written specifications

• Provide screenshots or Loom walkthroughs of past builds



If you have only built basic funnels and
 campaigns, this role is not for you.



SCREENING QUESTIONS (REQUIRED)



Answer these in your application:



What is the difference between a trigger and a workflow in GoHighLevel?



How do you prevent automation loops?



How do you stop an automation when a lead replies?



What is NOT included in a snapshot export?



Describe how you would structure a speed-to-lead system for a service business.



Include the phrase “Pipeline Logic” in your subject line.



Applications without answers will not be reviewed.



BONUS SKILLS



• AI workflow setup

• API/webhook integration

• WordPress form integration

• Zapier experience

• Stripe integration

• Reputation automation



ABOUT US



We are a structured, performance-driven marketing agency building scalable automation systems for service businesses. We value clean architecture, logic, and documentation.



We are not looking for a task-based VA.

We are looking for a systems builder.



Why This Version Is Better



• Doesn’t lock you into full-time

• Signals serious role

• Filters low-skill applicants

• Positions future growth

• Protects you from beginner-level hires

title: Level 2 Electrical Compliance & Metering Admin (Ausgrid / Endeavour)

Essential Experience (do not apply without this):

To apply:

title: Content & Creative Specialist
description:
About Us

The Event Engineer helps entrepreneurs scale to 7-figures and beyond. Led by Lisa Barry, we build high-converting event systems and world-class client experiences. Our mission: helping visionary founders grow wealth that fuels meaningful change.



The Role

We are seeking a high-level Creative Marketing Architect to own the visual and written soul of our brand. You are responsible for total brand dominance. This role goes beyond social media management; you will architect our front-end aesthetic and create original, scroll-stopping content that establishes Lisa Barry as the preeminent voice in the industry.



Key Responsibilities



1. Native Social Media & Audience Growth



Original Production: Create high-impact Reels, TikToks, and Shorts from scratch. Research trends, develop unique hooks, and execute flawless transitions.

YouTube Mastery: Own the end-to-end production of the weekly 20-minute "Deep Dive." Manage high-retention editing, SEO, and thumbnails that command clicks.

Viral Exposure: Execute the strategy to reach 50,000 – 100,000 followers through elite content and engagement.

Community Connection: Engage daily to build deep relationships using Lisa’s authentic voice.



2. Full-Spectrum Marketing & Asset Design



Product Design: Create high-converting lead magnets, PDF guides, and workbooks that look like 7-figure products.

Funnel Aesthetics: Ensure landing pages and sales funnels in GHL/Canva are visually stunning and premium.

Marketing Collateral: Design pitch decks, onboarding assets, and event-specific graphics (ads, banners, promos).



3. High-Authority Copywriting & Creative Direction



The Written Voice: Ghostwrite the weekly Substack, the "Wednesday Drop" Newsletter, and all social captions. Capture Lisa’s voice perfectly to inspire action.

Brand Guardianship: Ensure every touchpoint—from
 headers to YouTube descriptions—is visually elite.

Innovation: Stay ahead of marketing trends to keep the brand fun and innovative.



Who You Are



A Storyteller: You build authority through original visuals and marketing psychology.

An Owner: You don't wait for a task list. You see gaps and fill them with brilliance.

Design-Obsessed: If it isn’t world-class, it doesn’t get published.

High-Performance: You thrive in fast-paced environments and take pride in hitting growth targets.



Qualifications & Skills



Proven Results: Documented experience growing personal brands to 50k+ followers (metrics required).

Experience: 2–3+ years as a Creator or Marketing Assistant for high-ticket coaches or agencies.

Exceptional Communication: Flawless near-native English with a talent for voice matching.

Technical Mastery: Expert in Video Editing (CapCut/Premiere) and Visual Design (Canva/Photoshop/Figma).

Marketing Savvy: You understand how design impacts funnel conversion.



Application Requirements



Resume: A professional history of your experience.

Portfolio: Links to original social content, voice-matching copy, and marketing designs.

Growth Case Study: Breakdown of an account you grew and the strategy used.

DISC Profile: Please include your results.



Work Arrangement & Compensation



Remote: 9am – 5pm AEDT

Compensation: $1,000 AUD / month (Full-Time)

Long-term Growth: We are looking for team to grow with the brand; as we scale, your role and compensation will scale with it.

title: AI Research & Intelligence Analyst
description:
Personal Assistant to Founder | Part-Time | Remote



About the Role



We’re a US-based e-commerce company in need of a dedicated research analyst to stay on top of the fast-moving AI landscape and report back with real, actionable intelligence, not surface level summaries anyone could get from a 5 second ChatGPT prompt.



You’ll research new AI tools, platforms, and trends as they emerge. You’ll dig into the details, pricing, real user feedback, setup requirements, caveats, and how they compare to what we’re already using, and deliver clean, concise briefs the founders can act on.



What We Expect

• In-depth research — reading docs, forums, Reddit, 
, GitHub, and real user experiences. Not just the marketing page.

• Concise reporting — 1–3 page briefs max. Key findings up top, detail below. No 28-page papers.

• Tool comparisons — how does the new thing stack up against what we already use? Pricing, features, actual trade-offs.

• Proactive monitoring — flag things before I ask about them. Stay plugged in.

• Business lens — always frame it as: “does this matter for our e-commerce operation?”



Fair Warning



You’re welcome to use AI tools to assist your research. But if your deliverable reads like a raw ChatGPT/Claude output with no original analysis, you’re gone. I can generate that myself. I’m hiring you to think, to connect dots, form opinions, spot what others miss, and tell me what actually matters.



Who You Are

• A critical thinker who questions assumptions and digs past the first answer

• Organized and analytical — can take a complex topic and distill it into what matters

• Comfortable navigating technical content (AI tools, APIs, developer docs) even if you’re not a developer

• Self-starting — you don’t wait to be told what to look into

• Reliable internet and available for full-time hours



Details:

Rate: $3.0/hr

Schedule: Mon - Fri (sat optional)

Type: Part Time



If the research is well done and above my expectations there will be bonuses.



How to Apply



Send your resume and a short research sample: Pick any AI tool that’s gained attention in the last 60 days. Write a 1-page  - brief covering what it does, how to get started, real pros/cons from community feedback, pricing, and whether you’d recommend it for an e-commerce business. 



Also please write "I'm your analytst" at the top of your reply.

title: Appointment Setter - CST Schedule
description:
As an Appointment Setter, you will be responsible for identifying potential clients, reaching them on the phone, and scheduling an appointment for a sales representative for a follow-up visit, either in person or via telephone. If you enjoy talking to people and are interested in sales, this is the ideal position for you.



Salary: $5-$6 USD / hour

Schedule: CST

Work type: Remote



Responsibilities

- Ensure each prospective client and potential customer has a positive experience with our company

- Take the initiative to learn about the company and grow within the role

- Prioritize which appointments take priority over others to maximize revenue

- Field incoming phone calls and convert 50% or more to appointments

- Respond to new leads, calls, and messages within 15 minutes during working hours

- Develop and distribute reports of each day’s appointments

- Demonstrate a pleasant disposition with each prospect

- Properly explain the products and services to prospective customers when making appointments

- Complete required call sheets at the end of each day

- Use notion to track tasks, projects, SOD and EOD



Qualifications

- 1-2+ years experience as an appointment setter in US market

- Exhibit excellent English communication skills

- Must be able to work independently using Notion, Microsoft Office Suite

- Ability to multitask

- A positive attitude

- A pleasant speaking voice when engaging with prospects and customers

- Experience and willingness, working in a team environment

- Excellent organization skills



Technical Qualifications

- Fast internet connection

- Laptop/PC with good quality noise cancelling audio



About Us

JourneyWell is a creative studio and content agency based in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. We help professionals and growing brands create high-quality video, podcast, and visual content that builds trust and drives growth.



Our team manages the full content process, from planning and filming to editing and delivery. We focus on efficient studio sessions and content built for platforms like LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and websites.



We are a growing team that values clear communication, strong execution, and creative work that gets real results.

title: Content Strategist & Video Editor (Real Estate Focus)
description:
I am a local Realtor dedicated to showcasing the lifestyle, amenities, and hidden gems of our community. I am looking for a creative, detail-oriented, and proactive Virtual Assistant to take my raw video footage and turn it into a high-performing digital presence.



Your goal will be to maximize the reach of my long-form content by optimizing it for YouTube and repurposing it into viral-style short-form clips.



Key Responsibilities



Video Editing (Long & Short Form): Edit high-quality YouTube videos (vlogs, market updates, neighborhood tours) and repurpose them into engaging Reels, TikToks, and YouTube Shorts. (2-3 Long Form Videos A week)



High-Conversion Thumbnails: Design eye-catching, high-CTR (Click-Through Rate) thumbnails using Canva or Photoshop.



YouTube Management & SEO: Upload videos, write compelling titles/descriptions using keyword research, and manage tags/end screens to boost search rankings.



Social Media Marketing: Schedule posts across platforms and ensure the messaging aligns with our local brand.



Channel Growth: Monitor analytics to suggest improvements for future content based on what the audience is watching.



Required Skills & Experience



Proven Portfolio: Experience editing YouTube content and short-form vertical video (captions, fast cuts, B-roll).



Platform Expertise: Deep understanding of the YouTube algorithm, SEO tools (like TubeBuddy or VidIQ), and Instagram/TikTok trends.



Design Eye: Ability to create clean, professional thumbnails that stand out in a crowded feed.



Communication: Strong English skills (written and verbal) for drafting descriptions and communicating project status.



Reliability: Ability to meet deadlines and work independently.



Technical Preferences



Software: Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve.



Design: Canva or Adobe Photoshop.



Management: Familiarity with Trello, Asana, or Slack is a plus.



How to Apply:

Please send a brief intro about yourself and a link to your portfolio or specific examples of:



A long-form video you’ve edited.



Short-form clips (Reels/Shorts) you’ve created from long-form footage.



Thumbnails you have designed.

title: Photo Culling & Color Grading VA
description:
We're a small creative studio looking for a skilled Photo Culling & Color Grading VA to help process our photo sessions.



Your main responsibilities:



COLOR GRADING, COMPOSITION / CROP + KEYSTONE, CLEANUP (Capture One, Photoshop)



• Color grade selected images to match provided reference images, portfolio style



• Correct keystoning — straighten vertical and horizontal lines (e.g. buildings, walls, doorframes, horizon lines) caused by lens distortion or camera tilt. Ensure architectural elements and straight edges appear true and parallel



• Clean up and retouch images — remove objects, clone out minor logos/brands, crop peoples faces/eyes as needed



PAID TEST PROJECT



Must be willing to complete a 3-hour paid test project. You will receive up to 33 EIP files along with process documentation and a training video where we walk through 3–5 examples. You must download and open these EIPs in Capture One, then process all 33 images approximating the style and edits shown in the training video.



REQUIREMENTS



Must Have:



• Capture One (trial veresion is ok) — including experience opening and working off of EIP files (Enhanced Image Packages)



• Adobe Bridge — culling, color grading, ratings



• Photoshop (or similar) — clean up / remove objects, keystoning correction



• Strong eye for composition and commercial stock photography



• Reliable internet and ability to work independently

title: Call Center Transfer Agent
description:
JOB OVERVIEW

We are looking for a candidate with exceptional English language skills, previous outbound phone sales experience, and a background in transfer agent responsibilities.



Responsibilities:

Conduct outbound phone sales calls to prospective customers, verify information and qualify client

Engage customers in a courteous and friendly manner, actively listening to their inquiries and requirements.

Determine the customers' needs and identify the most suitable department for transferring the call.

Efficiently transfer calls to the designated department or representative while ensuring seamless communication.

Maintain accurate records of transferred calls and any relevant customer information.

Collaborate effectively with tea
mbers to optimize the call center's overall performance and customer satisfaction.

Handle a high volume of calls in a fast-paced environment while adhering to quality and efficiency standards.

Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage time effectively in a high-pressure environment.

Tech-savvy and proficient in using call center software and CRM systems.

A proactive and adaptable attitude, willing to take on challenges and meet targets consistently.

Immediate availability to start working with our team.

title: Real Estate Project Coordinator (Housing Finance & Funding focus)
description:
Role Overview:

We are seeking a high-level Virtual Assistant to manage the lifecycle of affordable housing funding applications. You will be responsible for extracting requirements from complex government/private NOFAs (Notices of Funding Availability), maintaining strict deadline calendars, and performing data entry in complex Excel-based pro-formas including unit mixes and capital stacks.



Key Responsibilities:

Compliance Review: Read through 50+ page funding manuals to extract checklist items, formatting rules, and submission deadlines.



Excel Management: Accurately input unit counts, Area Median Income (AMI) levels, and financial sources (Debt, Equity, Grants) into multi-tab workbooks.



Document Coordination: Manage "Team Narrative" files, ensuring resumes, bios, and corporate entity documents are updated and correctly formatted for each specific application.



Deadline Management: Send daily/weekly status reports to the Principal regarding upcoming "hard" and "soft" deadlines.



Required Qualifications:

Advanced Excel: Ability to navigate linked workbooks and troubleshoot formula errors.



Financial Literacy: Fundamental understanding of "Sources and Uses" and the difference between Debt (loans) and Equity (investor capital).



Analytical Writing: Ability to take existing project descriptions and "massage" them to fit specific page or word counts.



****How to Apply (Please Read Carefully)****

To be considered for this role, your application must include the following three items. Failure to follow these specific instructions will result in an immediate disqualification.



Subject Line: Change the subject line of your application to: [Your Name] | Housing Strategy VA | [Your Favorite City in the Philippines]



The "Logic Check" Answer: In the first paragraph of your cover letter, please answer this specific question: "If a housing project has a Total Development Cost (TDC) of $5,000,000 and the Senior Loan is $3,500,000, how much Equity Injection is required to balance the Sources and Uses (assuming no other grants)?"



The "Acronym" Sentence: Tell me in one sentence if you have ever worked with AMI (Area Median Income) or LIHTC calculations before. If you haven't, simply state: "I am familiar with complex Excel workbooks and am ready to learn the AMI framework."

title: Marketing Manager
description:
We have an established medical cosmetic clinic - 2 locations in Queensland, Australia.

Our brand is one of excellence and expertise.

We require an experienced marketing person who can create a solid marketing plan (with our input) and provide traceable results of increased bookings and increased spend of exisiting patients per visit.

It is essential that the marketing is able to reflect our brand and voice.
