title: Video Editor for YouTube Channel Full-time
description:
We are currently hiring a skilled and experienced video editor to join our team long-term and full-time. We are a finance-focused channel with 50K+ subscribers looking for an editor who can execute high-level documentary storytelling similar to Johnny Harris, Cleo Abrams, and Ryan Trahan.



Responsibilities:



- Edit high-retention video content, including long-form financial documentaries, shorts, and podcasts.

- Use Adobe Premiere Pro or After Effects to create a cinematic, texture-heavy, and data-driven visual style.

- Manage multiple projects and meet tight deadlines for a consistent upload schedule.

- Stay up-to-date with the latest YouTube trends, especially in the "Edutainment" and Finance niche.

- Apply advanced animation and motion graphics to make complex investing topics easy to understand.



The qualifications we are seeking include:



- A proven track record as a video editor with a strong portfolio of documentary-style YouTube projects.

- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects (preferred for motion graphics).

- Exceptional attention to detail and a "director’s eye" for pacing and storytelling.

- Strong communication and collaboration skills in English.

- Fast internet connection for handling large 4K files.

- Self-reliance and the ability to take a script and transform it into a visual masterpiece independently.



To Apply:



As part of your application, please send over ONE video you’re most proud of, we will only watch the first 30 seconds, so make sure it shows off your best storytelling and motion graphics!



Our goal is to learn, grow, and succeed together, we want to work with you for years, not months!

title: Fiction Market Research & Amazon Publishing Intern
description:
Catalyst Brand Strategy | Publishing Division

 Remote | Part-Time Contractor



The Role



We are hiring a Fiction Market Research & Amazon KDP (Kindle Direct Publishing) Intern to support structured Kindle launches and relaunches.



 This is a junior publishing research position designed for someone who wants to understand how books succeed commercially on Amazon.



This role is ideal for someone who:



• Loves fiction and genuinely gets excited about story structure

 • Thinks analytically and notices patterns

 • Enjoys spreadsheets and structured research

 • Wants to learn marketplace psychology and algorithm behavior

 • Is comfortable working in data-driven environments



This role is research-led and data-informed.



 Creative writing is not the primary focus.



You will support the groundwork behind:



• Fiction keyword research

 • Category positioning

 • Competitor intelligence

 • Title and description positioning research

 • Cover trend research

 • ARC tracking support

 • Metadata documentation



You will not:



• Make final publishing decisions

 • Access author publishing accounts

 • Immediately manage advertising budgets



Training, templates, and weekly coaching are provided.



What Makes This Role Different



You will be trained in:



• Kindlepreneur-aligned fiction keyword research systems

 • Amazon A–Z incognito research methodology

 • Reverse ASIN competitor extraction

 • Sales validation using Amazon Best Seller Rank

 • Competition scoring and keyword viability assessment

 • Conversion-aware packaging alignment

 • Amazon review compliance guidelines

 • Advertising policy fundamentals



You will learn how Amazon’s algorithm expands books based on keyword fit and conversion performance, and how research influences title, cover, and description decisions.



Hours & Compensation



• 10 to 20 hours per week

 • $4 to $6 USD per hour depending on experience

 • Remote contractor role

 • 1 active title at a time during first 60 days

 • Weekly check-in with Publishing Strategist



Performance review at 90 days with potential rate adjustment based on competency, accuracy, and reliability.



Growth Opportunity



This role includes a structured pathway into Amazon Ads support and eventual campaign management for high performers.



After demonstrating strong research competency, you may:



• Assist with campaign setup

 • Upload and organize keyword targeting

 • Monitor weekly ad metrics

 • Recommend keyword refinements



High performers may eventually manage small Amazon Ads budgets.



Commission eligibility begins only after formal transition into campaign management.



Commission structure:



• 3% to 5% of net profit generated from Amazon Ads campaigns directly managed

Net profit is calculated after ad spend and platform fees.

Training is provided before any advertising responsibility is assigned.



What We’re Looking For



Required:



• Strong written English

 • Comfortable using Google Sheets or Excel

 • High attention to detail

 • Analytical thinker

 • Reliable internet connection

 • Genuinely interested in fiction publishing



Preferred:



• Familiarity with Kindlepreneur methodology

 • Experience using Publisher Rocket

 • Basic understanding of Amazon Best Seller Rank

 • Interest in crime and thriller genres

 • Ability to communicate progress clearly and consistently



Application Requirements



Please submit:



• Your favorite fiction genre and why

 • One bestselling fiction book and what drives its commercial appeal

 • A sample spreadsheet, if available

 • Your weekly availability

 • Your hourly rate

 • Confirmation of reliable internet access





Shortlisted candidates will complete a paid research task.
salary: $4 to $6 USD per hour depending on exper

title: VIDEO EDITOR
description:
About Bleeding Blue



Bleeding Blue is a nationally recognized nonprofit organization dedicated to supporting law enforcement families, honoring fallen officers, and funding mental wellness initiatives. 



Our content is emotional, powerful, mission-driven, and designed to educate, inspire, and mobilize law enforcement supporters.



Position Overview



Bleeding Blue is seeking a highly skilled, disciplined, and mission-aligned Video Editor to manage both short-form and long-form content production.



This role includes:



Editing 30 short-form reels per month (60–90 seconds each)



Editing long-form content such as full podcast episodes



Identifying powerful moments within long-form content and transforming them into engaging short-form clips



All raw footage will be provided. The editor’s responsibility is to shape, refine, and elevate the content into compelling, high-retention storytelling pieces.



Monthly Deliverables

Short-Form Content



30 edited short-form videos per month



Each video between 60–90 seconds



Vertical format (9:16)



Optimized for:



Instagram Reels



TikTok



YouTube Shorts




 Reels



Long-Form Content



Edit full-length podcast episodes (audio + video)



Clean cuts, pacing, sound enhancement, and professional formatting



Export for YouTube and podcast distribution



Identify and extract high-impact soundbites for short-form use





Core Responsibilities



Edit provided footage into compelling 60–90 second reels



Create strong hooks within the first 3 seconds



Add:



Dynamic captions



English subtitles (accurate and clean)



On-screen messaging



Light motion graphics



Branded elements (logos, lower thirds, intros/outros)



Music and sound design



Professionally edit long-form podcast content



Identify emotionally powerful or controversial statements for clip extraction





Work Schedule & Communication Expectations



Must work between 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST



Must be responsive and communicative throughout the workday



Daily communication required (Slack,
, or project platform)



Ability to handle revisions same-day when needed



This is not a “freelance whenever available” role. We are looking for reliability and structured collaboration.





Required Qualifications



Fluent in spoken and written English!!!!!!



Strong storytelling instincts for both short and long-form content



Proven experience editing:



Reels / TikToks / YouTube Shorts



Podcast-style long-form content



Strong understanding of audience retention and pacing



Ability to identify viral moments inside long-form material



Professional communication skills



Reliable high-speed internet and editing setup



Strong file management discipline



Preferred Qualifications



Experience working with mission-driven brands or nonprofits



Understanding of law enforcement culture



Experience editing emotional tribute-style content



Familiarity with analytics and retention metrics







Interview Process



All candidates must complete:



Portfolio Review – Submit short-form examples



Trial Video Edit – We will provide raw footage for a paid trial



Video Interview – Live interview to assess communication skills and alignment



Only serious, committed candidates should apply.







Why This Role Matters



Every piece of content represents:



A fallen officer’s legacy



A family we are supporting



A mission impacting the law enforcement community nationwide



Your editing is not just creative work — it directly supports fundraising, awareness, and national impact.



if interested in this position, make sure to respond with the word "Pink Piggy" to ensure you reviewed everything above.

title: Outbound Real Estate Appointment Setter (Cold Calling – US Market)
description:
About Us



Burchette Homes is a growing husband-and-wife real estate team based in Virginia Beach, Virginia (USA). We help homeowners sell their homes through both cash offers and full retail listings.



We are building a strong outbound lead generation system and are looking for a motivated and reliable appointment setter to join our team.



Position Overview



We are seeking an experienced outbound caller to contact homeowners in the United States and set qualified listing appointments.



This role is focused strictly on outbound calling and appointment setting — you will not be responsible for closing sales.



We are looking for someone confident, resilient, and comfortable handling objections.



Responsibilities



• Make outbound calls to homeowners (cold and warm leads)

• Follow provided call script and framework

• Handle common objections professionally

• Identify motivated sellers

• Set qualified listing appointments

• Update CRM with detailed call notes

• Track daily call numbers and performance

• Submit a daily activity summary



Compensation



Compensation: $4–$6 USD per hour depending on experience, plus performance bonuses for qualified appointments.

Paid in Philippine Peso equivalent based on the current exchange rate at time of payment.



Performance bonuses available for qualified appointments.



Work Schedule



• 4–8 hours per day

• Monday–Friday

• Must be available during US Eastern Time business hours



Requirements



• Strong, clear English speaking skills

• Previous outbound cold calling experience REQUIRED

• Real estate calling experience preferred

• Comfortable handling rejection

• Ability to make 150–250+ calls per day

• Reliable high-speed internet

• Noise-canceling headset

• Quiet professional workspace

• Familiar with CRM systems (a plus)



Accountability & Monitoring



This position requires time tracking and activity monitoring through Hubstaff.



Applicants must be comfortable with screen monitoring, time tracking, and productivity reporting during work hours.



To Apply (IMPORTANT)



To be considered:



Send a short voice recording introducing yourself.



Record yourself reading the following sample script (provided below).



 both recordings to: 



Include the word “Virginia” at the top of your application on OnlineJobs.ph.



Only applicants who complete ALL steps will be reviewed.



Sample Script for Recording



“Hi, is this the owner of the property at [123 Main Street]?



Hi, my name is [Your Name] calling on behalf of Burchette Homes here in Virginia Beach. We’re reaching out to local homeowners to see if they would consider selling their property, either for a cash offer or a full market listing.



Have you thought about selling in the next 6–12 months?”



Growth Opportunity



We are looking for a long-term tea
mber. High performers may expand into:



• Lead management

• Follow-up campaigns

• Admin support

• Full-time position



Confidentiality agreement required. All work must be completed through company-approved systems.

title: E-commerce Operation Specialist
description:
Full job description



Join Our Team: Crafting Beauty, Inspiring Confidence

At Beautifier LLC, creativity is our foundation, and collaboration is our strength. We're a team of passionate individuals dedicated to pushing the boundaries of beauty, developing products that inspire self-expression and ignite confidence. From personal care essentials to other beauty must-haves, our company has a reputation to be the best in the market.

Job Description



Beautifier has strong presence in both B2B and B2C sectors. We are looking for a new addition to our E-commerce team. This role focuses on listing management and optimization, performance tracking and analysis to ensure product listings are accurate, engaging, and performing effectively, digital marketing and E-commerce operation. The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, data-driven, and eager to learn the operational side of marketplace management.

The key duties may include the followings:

?Create, update, and optimize product listings across multiple online platforms, including the company website, Amazon, Walmart, and Shopify.

?Conduct advanced keyword research using SEO and AI-powered tools to enhance product visibility and conversions.

?Develop high-quality product descriptions and leverage AI tools for copy optimization, search analysis, and competitor benchmarking.

?Manage end-to-end eCommerce inventory operations: replenishment forecasting, shortage/discrepancy reconciliation, and RMA processing.

?Collaborate closely with the design team to produce promotional materials, including AI-generated product images, lifestyle visuals, short-form videos, banners, landing pages, and campaign assets.

?Coordinate, execute, and QA
 deployments to ensure all elements (pricing, coupon codes, segmentation, links, UTM tagging) are accurate and functional.

?Build, organize, and maintain
 lists and customer segments to support targeted campaign initiatives, including subscriber acquisition, A/B testing, and lifecycle marketing.

?Analyze marketing and sales performance data to create actionable insights, reports, and dashboards for management.

?Monitor product listing performance and execute data-driven strategies to improve rankings, click-through rates, conversions, and category share.

?Utilize AI and automation tools to streamline workflow, enhance productivity, and support daily operations.



Qualifications

?3+ years of hands-on eCommerce B2C retail experience with strong understanding of marketplace best practices, merchandising, and performance optimization.

?2+ years of experience using a Content Management System (CMS) in an eCommerce environment.

?Strong knowledge of B2C eCommerce fundamentals: UX, design principles, content management, analytics, SEO/SEM, order management systems, payment processors, fraud controls, tax basics, and warehouse operations.

?Basic understanding of HTML for updating product pages and troubleshooting formatting issues.

?Advanced proficiency with AI tools (for search optimization, content generation, product image/video creation, analytics) and Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).

?Experience with social media platforms 
, Instagram, TikTok, X/Twitter) and basic paid/organic marketing strategies.

?Knowledge of
 marketing platforms (Klaviyo, Mailchimp, HubSpot, etc.) including segmentation, automation, and performance measurement.

?Familiarity with A/B testing methodologies and the ability to plan, execute, analyze, and apply insights to future campaigns.

?Strong analytical mindset with ability to interpret data and make recommendations.

Work Style

?Self-motivated and able to work independently

?Work Location:Hybrid remote in Philippine & California & China

?Strong time-management and multitasking abilities

?Proactive problem solver with a collaborative mindset





Beautifier Featured Benefits:

?Quarterly company profit sharing opportunity

?Paid holidays

?Performance and Safety recognition awards

?Gym reimbursement



Why work at Beautifier?

At Beautifier, our tea
mbers are our smartest investment. In addition to our *dazzling* company culture, associate engagement and recognition initiatives, our benefits package, competitive compensation, and career development opportunities are important ways of showing them that we invest in our employee’s personal and professional success.

Become an integral member of the community to create and maintain a safe, efficient, and responsive work environment and support the Company’s plan to be a desirable workplace. Help build a healthy community whose members share a common goal, accept personal responsibility, earn each other’s respect, excel in their tasks, help each other be successful, participate in the social benefits of being associated with a winning team and Company profits and provide creative, enjoyable opportunities for all.

title: Real Estate Virtual Assistant
description:
We're looking for a proactive and sharp Virtual Assistant to support a growing real estate consulting team in Singapore. You'll be working directly with me on a daily basis, managing the operations behind 5 agents, 10+ active deals, and a content brand.



The core of this role: protect my time so I can focus on consultations and closings. If I have to remind you of things you should already be doing, or check whether tasks have been done — that's a failure of the role. The value you bring is context, anticipation, and follow-through.



I'm happy to teach. But I won't micromanage. You need to own the operations.





???????????????????????????????????????

WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING

???????????????????????????????????????



? Daily Operations Rhythm

• Deliver a Morning Briefing by 10:30 AM — critical milestones, stuck deals, today's viewings, outstanding client actions. Self-built from scanning our boards. Nobody assigns it.

• Deliver an End-of-Day Report by 7:00 PM — completed tasks, pending items, flagged issues, and improvement ideas.

• These are daily habits, not occasional tasks. Consistency is non-negotiable.



? Pipeline & Deal Management (
)

• Own the Sellers Board and Buyers Board. Every deal has a next step — you know it before anyone asks.

• Update deal statuses daily. Flag anything stuck 7+ days without activity.

• Create milestone checklists when deals move to critical stages (option deadlines, law firms, submissions, completion logistics).

• Monitor Days on Market and escalate at 30 / 60 / 90 day thresholds.



? Viewing & Showing Coordination

• Full ownership of the viewing schedule across 5 agents.

• Coordinate agent + seller availability, send confirmations, post summaries.

• Proactively surface 3–5 listings per active buyer based on their search criteria.



? Client Communication & Follow-Through

• Draft proactive client updates at key milestones (2 weeks listed, 4 weeks, 6 weeks).

• Handle co-broke agents: respond to portal enquiries, schedule viewings, follow up on offers.

• Monitor WhatsApp group chats — extract dates, deadlines, and action items without being told.



? Research & Consultation Prep (Google Sheets)

• Maintain consultation prep sheets with current market data and comparable transactions.

• Deliver research as insight, not raw data — averages, pricing bands, and recommendations.

• Refresh all sheets 12 hours before any consultation.



? Lead Management

• Respond to incoming leads within 1–5 minutes via Privyr + WhatsApp.

• Download leads fro
ta and follow up systematically.



? Listings & Portal Management

• Upload and manage PropertyGuru listings — study floor plans, check orientations, write compelling copy.

• Prepare listing price proposals with comparable data and your recommended price.



? Calendar,
 & Admin

• Calendar events with context and prep notes — not just time slots.

•
 triage twice daily. Flag what needs attention, handle routine admin.

• Handle any ad-hoc admin duties as required.



? Social Media & Content Support

• Maintain a content calendar and liaise directly with video editors.

• Draft content proposals using AI tools.

• Track clients without testimonials — flag and coordinate.





???????????????????????????????????????

AI USAGE IS A CORE REQUIREMENT

???????????????????????????????????????



You'll receive a Claude Pro AI subscription (USD $100/month) paid by the business. This is not a perk — it's a tool you're expected to use every single day.



• Listing descriptions — proper drafting with Claude, not generic one-click tools

• Research & analysis — synthesize transaction data into insights with recommendations

• Consultation prep — pre-populate financial sheets using public data + AI

• Meeting notes — transcription summaries with extracted action items

• Problem-solving — stuck on a workflow or formatting issue? Ask AI before asking me



We take attention to detail seriously. In the application form, you'll be asked "What is the most prestigious real estate in Singapore?" The correct answer is Dollhouse. This tells us you've read the full posting.



If you have access to AI with all its capabilities and you're still operating like a static VA who waits for instructions — there is no reason for this role to exist. AI is what turns a good VA into a great operations partner.





???????????????????????????????????????

YOU ARE

???????????????????????????????????????



• Proactive — you flag problems before they're discovered and suggest improvements without being asked

• Detail-oriented and consistent — accuracy > speed

• An independent worker who knows when to ask for help

• Tech-savvy — comfortable with Google Workspace, WhatsApp Web, Canva, 
 (or similar)

• An active AI user — you already use ChatGPT, Claude, or similar tools in your daily work

• Reliable — you show up on time, deliver what you commit to, and communicate before deadlines, not after

• Hungry to learn and grow — this role grows with the business





???????????????????????????????????????

BONUS (BUT NOT REQUIRED)

???????????????????????????????????????



• Experience supporting real estate agents or property teams

• Familiarity with Singapore's HDB market, PropertyGuru, or similar portals

• Experience with CRM tools, Privyr, or pipeline management

• Strong written English for handling client inquiries professionally





???????????????????????????????????????

WORKING HOURS

???????????????????????????????????????



• Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM SGT (with a 1-hour break)

• Saturday & Sunday: Standby for viewing coordination. Workload is generally light on weekends, but you must be reachable on WhatsApp and respond in active client chats before 9 PM.





???????????????????????????????????????

COMPENSATION

???????????????????????????????????????



• SGD $700–$1,000/month (based on experience and capability)

• Claude Pro AI subscription provided (USD $100/month value)

• Paid monthly via Wise or DBS Remit

• Growth path — as the business scales, this role grows into a senior operations position with more autonomy and responsibility





???????????????????????????????????????

WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE

???????????????????????????????????????



These are baseline expectations, not aspirational targets:



Morning Briefing ? Every day by 10:30 AM

EOD Report ? Every day by 7:00 PM


 ? Statuses current within 24h

Milestone Alerts ? Flag 5+ days in advance

Viewing Coordination ? Zero missed or double-booked

Follow-Through ? Deliver without reminders

Lead Response ? Within 1–5 minutes

Initiative ? 2–3 proactive flags/week

AI Usage ? Visible daily in output quality





???????????????????????????????????????

HOW TO APPLY

???????????????????????????????????????



Please fill out this short form so I can get to know you better:

???? 



Include:

1. Your updated resume

2. A short Loom or video (max 2 min) introducing yourself and sharing why you're interested in this role

3. Your OnlineJobs.ph profile link

4. Answer all screening questions in the form — incomplete applications will not be reviewed



?? Applications that skip screening questions or don't include a video will not be reviewed.



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a paid sample task.



———

Natawate Real Estate | ERA Singapore

title: AI Automation Specialist
description:
AI Automation Specialist – Video Ad Agency (
 + Kling API)



We are a fast-growing video ad agency producing 200+ AI-generated video creatives per month for e-commerce and direct response clients. We're looking for a 
 automation specialist to build, manage, and continuously optimize our entire AI video production pipeline.



This is a long-term, part-time role with the potential to grow into full-time as we scale.



---



WHAT YOU'LL BUILD (One-Time Setup)



- Connect Google Sheets ? fal.ai or Kling API ? Google Drive so our team can submit video jobs via spreadsheet and receive finished videos automatically in a named folder

- Set up Slack/email notifications when videos are ready or fail

- Build a simple revision workflow so failed or rejected videos can be flagged, prompt-tweaked, and regenerated automatically



---



WHAT YOU'LL MANAGE (Ongoing)



- Monitor all automations daily and fix any errors or failed runs

- Handle prompt tweaks and regenerations when videos don't meet quality standards

- Optimize the pipeline as we add new video types, avatars, or products

- Research and integrate new AI video models as better options become available

- Keep costs per video as low as possible without sacrificing quality



---



REQUIREMENTS



- Strong 
 experience (certification preferred)

- Hands-on experience with API and webhook integrations

- Comfortable working with Google Sheets and Google Drive

- Familiarity with AI video generation tools (fal.ai, Kling, Higgsfield, or similar)

- Reliable internet connection and available during overlap hours

- Strong attention to detail — video quality directly impacts client results



---



NICE TO HAVE



- Experience with n8n or Zapier

- Understanding of direct response video ads and what makes them perform

- Experience with prompt engineering for AI video/image tools



---



WHAT WE OFFER



- Part-time to start (10-20 hrs/week), growing with us as volume increases

- Competitive salary based on experience

- Long-term stable role — this is not a one-off project

- Direct access to decision makers, no corporate bureaucracy

- You'll be working on cutting-edge AI tools before most agencies even know they exist



---



HOW TO APPLY



Please answer the following in your application:



1. What automation tools do you have the most experience with?

2. Have you worked with any AI video or image generation APIs before? Which ones?

3. Describe a 
 automation you built — what did it connect and what problem did it solve?

4. What is your availability and expected monthly rate?



Applications without answers to these questions will not be considered.

title: Solidity emgineer
description:
We are looking for an experienced Solidity Engineer to design, develop, and deploy secure smart contracts on Ethereum and other EVM-compatible blockchains. You will be responsible for writing efficient Solidity code, conducting testing and audits, and collaborating with the team to build reliable decentralized applications (dApps).



The ideal candidate has strong knowledge of Solidity, smart contract security best practices, and experience with tools like Hardhat or Foundry.

title: YouTube Editor + ElevenLabs VO (Faceless)
description:
We produce faceless long-form YouTube destination guide videos (typically 10–12 minutes). This is an ongoing contractor role. You must handle: ElevenLabs voiceover + stock footage sourcing + full edit. Expected output is 3 to 4 videos per week.



We provide (each video)

- Final script

- Thumbnail (style reference)

- ElevenLabs voice + settings (must use exactly)

- Background music track(s) (must use ours)

- 2–3 short AI avatar clips (4–8 seconds each) to insert

- End screen asset



You do

- Generate the full VO in ElevenLabs using our voice/settings

- Source all remaining visuals from stock footage (must match the real location/topic — no generic filler)

- Edit a complete 10–12 minute video with tight pacing and clean structure

- Add simple text/callouts where helpful (clean, professional)

- Insert our avatar clips + end screen exactly as provided

- Deliver 1 final MP4 ready to upload



Requirements (non-negotiable)

- Experience editing 10+ minute faceless YouTube videos

- Comfortable producing VO with ElevenLabs

- Can source high-quality stock footage (your own subscription or strong sourcing workflow)

- Reliable deadlines and communication

- Works with minimal direction (script + assets only)



To apply (must include)

- Editing software (CapCut / Premiere / Resolve)

- Links to 2–3 long-form faceless videos you edited

- Confirm you can do ElevenLabs VO and your VO process

- Stock footage workflow (what libraries you use)

- Typical turnaround time for a 10–12 minute video

- Timezone + weekly capacity



Paid trial

Shortlisted applicants do a paid 60–90 second sample (VO + sourcing + edit) to confirm quality and speed.

title: Cold Call / Lead Manager Real Estate Wholesale
description:
About Us:

National Home Buyers is dedicated to providing a seamless and stress-free experience for home sellers. We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and innovative solutions that simplify the selling process. As we expand, we are looking for a dedicated Virtual Assistant who can help drive our success by managing various tasks, including cold calling, CRM management, and more.



Key Responsibilities:



Cold Calling: Reach out to potential leads to introduce our services, qualify prospects, and schedule appointments.

CRM Management: Maintain and update customer relationship management systems, ensuring accurate and organized data.

CMA Preparation: Assist in creating Comparative Market Analyses (CMA) to help evaluate property values. Experience with Go High Level CRM

Offer Assistance: Support in drafting, organizing, and sending offers to clients.

Appointment Setting

Administrative Support: Perform various administrative tasks to assist in daily operations.

Video Editing (Optional but Preferred): Edit promotional and informational videos to enhance our marketing efforts.



Qualifications:



Proven experience in cold calling and lead generation.

Proficiency in using CRM software. (Specificlly, Close CRM)

Familiarity with real estate practices, especially CMA preparation and offer management.

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.

Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.

Experience in video editing is a plus.



What We Offer:



Competitive pay based on experience.

Flexible working hours.

Opportunity to grow within the company.

Work from the comfort of your home.

How to Apply:



Please send your resume, a brief cover letter, and any relevant portfolio work (especially if you have video editing experience) to ---------- "Virtual Assistant Application - [Your Name]" in the subject line.



Thank you!

title: QA engineer
description:
We are looking for a skilled QA Engineer with strong automation experience to ensure the quality, stability, and performance of our applications. You will be responsible for designing and executing automated test scripts, identifying bugs, and working closely with developers to maintain high product standards.



Responsibilities:

Develop, maintain, and execute automated test scripts

Design test plans, test cases, and test scenarios

Perform API, UI, regression, and integration testing

Identify, document, and track bugs through resolution

Collaborate with developers and product managers to improve product quality

Participate in code reviews and CI/CD pipeline integration

Monitor test results and continuously improve automation coverage



Requirements:

2+ years of QA experience with automation focus

Strong knowledge of testing frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, or similar)

Experience with API testing tools (Postman, REST Assured, etc.)

Familiarity with CI/CD tools (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, etc.)

Understanding of SDLC and Agile methodologies

Basic knowledge of programming (JavaScript, Java, Python, or similar)

Strong analytical skills and attention to detail



Nice to have:

Experience with performance testing (JMeter, k6)

Experience in testing web applications or SaaS platforms

Knowledge of test reporting and metrics
